attributes.action: Ensure rail companies pay rail licence fee money within a short period of time
attributes.additional_details: Rail companies can over bid and may not pay any money by promising a large sum at the end of a contract. However, if the company fails to deliver the contract it can get away without paying the licence cost. Demand the cost within 5 years of signing a contract. The travelling public/ tax payer wants hard cash not promises of riches which never come true.

rejection.details: What action are you asking central Government to take?
